OOC: I was joking. I like your names. I perfer Geotrons, but what's 
the logic behind that name. Still, I like them both.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> OOC: No offense, but I'd prefer something less copied. Geotrons? 
> Wilds?
>

> > OOC: Thanks, but if we do form a new facton what should we call 
it? 
> > Since I first posted it I've come to the conclusion that 
"Carnitrons

I'm
